column5: After having a few Pike follow our baits we made a run to fish for Trout, caught one Brown & had another on, after a couple hours we headed back for Pike, I started with the 7" Bass Magnets Swim Bait, then switched to the 5" wham a solid hit & that's when I caught the White Bass, 7' of water 1 ft visibility, back at it tomorrow, come on Pike SBK
Now thats a different line up of fish! But varity is awesome!! Good for you!
